description: The PB_TX_SET_ADV_INV table contains the advices for invoice of this PB transaction set.

columns.name: PB_TXSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing transaction set.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the advice for invoice on the transaction set.

columns.name: ADVFOR_PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the adviced invoice on the transaction set. Used when defining custom transaction set advice from a batch utility record.
